summary: Mat\'s Ashandarei from The Wheel of Time
descriptionHtml:
“Thus is our treaty written; thus is agreement made.
Thought is the arrow of time; memory never fades.
What was asked is given. The price is paid.”

Resting between two branches of a big tree, shrouded in mist just north-east of Riften lies Mat\'s legendary weapon, the Ashandarei.

---
Help with getting the blood-stain mesh to not look like a greatsword is highly appreciated! Send me a message :)

Oh, and all feedback is highly appreciated :D

Cheers!
/Gabriel


Install
=======
1. Extract the archive in to your Skyrim data folder and chose to overwrite when prompted.
2. Play the game


Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

Skyrim\\data\\meshes\\weapons\\Ashandarei\\Ashandarei.nif
Skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\Ashandarei\\...
Skyrim\\data\\textures\\cubemaps\\Ashandarei\\duncaveruinblue_e.dds


Incompatibility
===============
None that I know of.

Changelog
===============
V 2.0:
- Modified the blade-mesh, updated UVs and changed the look of all textures.
- Changed the animation from 2HandedSword to 2HandedAxe
- Lowered the speed of the weapon from 1.5 to 1.2
author: gabbe_master
